docs.text:
Merlin.jl


Merlin.jl
 is a neural network library in 
Julia
.




★ Functions




Getting Started




It aims to provide a fast, flexible and concise neural network library for machine learning.




★ Install


#julia
 Pkg.clone(
https://github.com/hshindo/Merlin.jl.git
)








★ Optional Requirements




cuDNN
 v4 (for CUDA GPU)
